title: What is wrong with Riot, Im level 5 honor
body: Level 5 honor and fianlly got my second honor capsule and it contains ashe, wtf is this shit

replies.body: Always someone who will complain about getting free things.......

One thing to consider is that Honour capsules are based on RNG, in the same way as Hextech Chests, so it stands to reason that you might have some "bad luck" when opening them. It may suck to get champs you already own, particularly low-cost champs like Ashe, but there's not much to be done about that short of a revamp of how capsules give loot, but then we'd be talking about a potentially negative impact top Riot's monetisation, which is an important aspect to keeping the game going.
i havent got a single honor capsule and im level 4, so much for being a good player

> [{quoted}](name=Willy Donka,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=n4TLGsqZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-07T10:04:35.741+0000)
>
> i havent got a single honor capsule and im level 4, so much for being a good player

If it makes you feel better, I got 2 capsules, both contained champ shards and ones I already own (I forgot what the first one was, the second contained Gragas shard).
Update: got a capsule, had a champion shard, lee sin. Guess who I already own? So much for being a good team mate I guess.

playing well, keeping positive, get to lobby... no honours still lvl 2
